499360.name: Mind Spheres (Soundtrack)
499360.description:
The original soundtrack of the game Mind Spheres, produced by Frost Orb.

Track list:

01. Frost Orb - Mind Spheres
02. Frost Orb - Piano 1
03. Frost Orb - Piano 2
04. Frost Orb - Piano 3
05. Frost Orb - Piano 4
06. Frost Orb - Piano 5
07. Frost Orb - Orchestral 1
08. Frost Orb - Orchestral 2
09. Frost Orb - Ambience 1
10. Frost Orb - Ambience 2
11. Frost Orb - Ambience 3
